name: PO Requistion Forms
script:
# Create a set of unique custom requisitions from doc items
requisition_set = set(item.custom_requisition for item in doc.items if item.custom_requisition)

# Clear the custom_connected_requisitions list in the document
doc.custom_connected_requisitions = []

# Append each unique requisition to custom_connected_requisitions
for req in requisition_set:
    doc.append("custom_connected_requisitions", {"requisition": req})

name: Deleting Draft Invoices API
Purchase Invoice Description
